document_data.caption: A map showing Oakengrove Abbey near Ashabenford.
document_data.name: Oakengrove Abbey
document_data.mainbody: The '''Oakengrove Abbey''' was a [[human]] temple stronghold dedicated to the worship of the deity [[Silvanus]].
document_data.History: It was founded in [[591 DR]]. It stood about {{SI|70|mi|k|long=yes}} west of the [[Standing Stone]] in [[Cormanthor]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The abbey was lead by Oakfather [[Gannon Durei]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}. He supervised eight other [[priest]]s.
